teams.text: The top teams in League A would advance to the Nations League Finals. The top teams in leagues B, C and D would be promoted to the higher league. The last-placed teams in leagues A and B would be relegated to the lower league. The last-placed teams in league C would play in relegation play-outs to determine 2 to be relegated to league D.

matches.awarded_text: Awarded: The Switzerland vs Ukraine match was awarded as a 3–0 win to Switzerland after being cancelled as Ukraine were placed in quarantine prior to the match due to positive SARS-CoV-2 tests in the team.

matches.awarded_text: Awarded: The Romania vs Norway match was awarded as a 3–0 win to Romania after being cancelled as Norway could not travel to the match due to a positive SARS-CoV-2 test in the team.
